gnat.comparison
Class GOTermSimilarity

java.lang.Object
  gnat.comparison.GOTermSimilarity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GOTermSimilarity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Implementation of a GOTermSimilarity measure to compare GO codes for texts against GO codes for genes, comparable to Schlicker et al. This class uses a GOAccess to access a database that contains shortest distances and Lowest Common Ancestors (LCA) for GO terms.

Similarity/distance is based on the shortest path using two terms' LCA and the depth of this LCA in the overall hierarchy.

Author:
Jörg Hakenberg <jhakenberg@users.sourceforge.net>

goTermDistances

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> goTermDistances
Stores the distances between two GO codes. Key: "GO:0005575;GO:0001695".

go2gofile

public java.lang.String go2gofile
Where to find the existing GO term distances. Default: go2go.obj.
Format: HashMap<String, Float>, see goTermDistances.

initiallyLoadedSimilarities

private int initiallyLoadedSimilarities

computedNewSimilarity

private boolean computedNewSimilarity

goAccess

private static GOAccess goAccess

useDatabase

public boolean useDatabase
Accesses the database that contains LCA information on GO terms when distances were not already calculated before. These distances are stored in go2gofile. If set to false, uses distances from that file only and returns NEG.INF for unknown distances.
